long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Yureka!  This is our early Alpha!  All of your shopping expeditions are organized!  Overwhelmed with choices when shopping? Save products, reviews, notes, and even videos all in one place to help you make the best possible shopping choice.

FEATURES:
==========
• Save Products as you shop with our Bookmarking toolbar
• Create Collections and invite Co-Shoppers to collaborate
• Add notes while you shop
• Compare prices and reviews side-by-side
• Invite friends to share and collaborate

HOW TO USE
==========
• Install plugin and pin to Chrome toolbar
• On product detail pages, click the bookmark icon that appears on the right-hand side of the screen
• Create collections and add notes in Yureka

TROUBLESHOOTING
==========
• To leave bug reports and feature requests, email us at support@ohyureka.com
